get.summary: Returns the Borrower's details and statuses
get.description:
This endpoint doesn't need other authentication than the proper username and password, and can be used anonymously.
Note: Does not authenticate the Borrower to Koha!

parameters.name: uname
parameters.description: The Username the Borrower uses to authenticate

parameters.name: passwd
parameters.description: The Password the Borrower uses to authenticate

400.description: Password authentication failed using username or password
